```{r, message = FALSE}
library(surveygraph)
```

## Coercion

The most important grouping verb is `group_by()`: it takes a data frame and one or more variables to group by:

```{r}
df <- data.frame(item1 = c(1, 2, 3), item2 = c(4, 5, 7))
```
